mapper.select: select `pid`,`document_date` as documentDate,`due_date` as dueDate,`pay_money` as payMoney,`amount_paid` as amountPaid,`this_pay` as thisPay,`unpay_money` as unpayMoney, `pay_account` as payAccount,dictm.name as settlementMethod,`settlement_num` as settlementNum,`remarks`,`source_num` as sourceNum, dicts.name as `sourceType`,`paymentform_id` as paymentformId,payfitem.`del_flag` as delFlag from cus_paymentform_item payfitem left join cus_dictionary dicts on payfitem.source_type = dicts.id left join cus_dictionary dictm on payfitem.settlement_method = dictm.id where paymentform_id = #{value}
